description: The ID for the transcript note data load.

Has_Transcript_NoteObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Has_Transcript_NoteObjectID.type: WID,  Academic_Period_Record_ID,  Academic_Person_ID,  Historical_Program_of_Study_Record_ID,  Historical_Student_Academic_Period_Record_ID,  Historical_Student_ID,  Historical_Student_Record_ID,  Student_ID,  Student_Period_Record_ID,  Student_Program_of_Study_Record_ID,  Student_Record_ID,  Universal_Identifier_ID
Has_Transcript_NoteObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Has_Transcript_NoteObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Transcript_Note_Data.description: The Transcript Note can be for the Student Reference, Academic Record Reference, Program of Study Record Reference or Academic Period Record Reference for a Student or Historical Student.
A boolean indicating whether or not the transcript note is official.

description: The container for transcript note instance data.

validation.validation: Please select a unique order for this transcript note.
You can only submit an Academic Period Record or an Historical Student Academic Period Record.
You can only submit a program of study record that isn't discontinued.
